column4: hi guys, can someone tell me how can i watch .mov on ubuntu? i installed all kind of codecs and players and god knows what more and i still have just sound without the picture.. i even wine the quicktime player but when i start the movie my monitor goes black from time to time
i have very shitty video card so i dont use compiz or anything else. brontoeee its a tutorial about a program language and its .mov format.
